item.description:
OK, let's let all go to CQX, Chatham, for their Blueberry Pancakes. Rick has said he used to fly there and how he....yeah yeah yeah...
But, let's humor him and go anyhow. Maybe he'll even be PIC and we can say all the things to him while he's flying that he says to us....

It's a short hop. 95 nm. Fun part is it's always a crosswind... nice..... From there, who knows, up the coast to see if the whales are out, city tour of Boston, over to someplace else or just home to lick our wounds?

See ya then, thanks Rick for the idea.
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Rick M's Blueberry Pancake Fantasy
